name: Tales of the World: Reve Unitia
name_original: Tales of the World: Reve Unitia
description:
Tales of the World: Reve Unitia is a RPG game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 23-10-2014. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
Tales of the World: Reve Unitia is available on Nintendo 3DS.
It was scored by Go Shiina.
